Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: disappointed
Reviews.Content: Poor quality pictures - blurry even with the motion suppression and flash on.  You get what you pay for, but in this case you don't even get that.  Camera is total junk.  I bought two of these cameras and they're both garbage. I only gave it one star because zero may be too ambiguous.

Reviews.Title: good fuctional camera
Reviews.Author: subwo "Subwo"
Reviews.Content: Good for what I use it for. I use it to take pictures to.post items for sale at auction sites and as a handy camera that fits in a shirt pocket. Has a flash which my ipod touch's camera does not. I use rechargeable AAA batteries and they last for quite a while.

ProductInfo.Features:
7.1-megapixel 1/4" CMOS
4x digital zoom
1.8" color TFT-LCD display
Digital image stabilizer
Uses 3 AAA batteries (Not Included)
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar Vivicam V7020 7.1 Megapixel Digital Camera - PURPLE
